Name: Canopic jar lid
Description: A canopic jar lid made from a creamy pottery in the form of Amset. The face and beard are small compared to the full and flaring wig. The whole lid is hollow (see the fourth image) and quite thin compared to others in the collection The face is red in colour but this may be modern. The wig is detailed in black and blue, the colour is all lost from the chin down to the bottom edge.
